actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to provide that ionization smoke detectors shall bear a label specifying that they contain radioactive materials.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for any person (other than a common carrier) engaged in the packing, labeling, or distribution of any ionization smoke detection device to distribute any such device which does not bear a specified health warning. Makes a violation of this Act an unfair or deceptive act or practice under the Federal Trade Commission Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that ionization smoke detectors shall bear a label specifying that they contain radioactive materials.
